name: Silent Memories P.T.
description:
STORY:

You are Norman, a man who wakes up in an unknown house, without memories and completely alone. You'll need to find out what happened, why are you here, who lived in that house, and most important, what is going on there... One certain thing is... There is a lot of silence... Discover your past, find clues, to proceed on that strange corridor... And remember... "The only me is me. Are you sure the only you is you?"

GAMEPLAY:
You will impersonate Norman, a normal man who doesn't remember anything of his past. His purpose is to find a way out of that house, and discover his memories. Find clues, listen the messages, inspect anything that could help your character to understand the situation and to make him move through a corridor which never ends.
Be careful of your actions, your curiosity could be fatal...

FEATURES:
-Riddles
-Average Gameplay Duration: 25-30 Minutes
-Cutscenes in Game Engine
-Language Select
-Custom Sprites and Animations
-Screen Effects

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
-OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
-Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
-Memory:512 MB RAM
-Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution.
